title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: Label font size doesn't change right away it is modified.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label and edit its font size as '18 points'.
OB: The label's height does not adjust automatically when the font size is modified.
EB: The label's height should adjust automatically to match the font size after it is modified.
SR:
1. Create a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label to '18 points'.
3. Observe if the label's height adjusts accordingly.
